data.message: Please bring back the ability to report comments and posts as spam. Currently the only options are to message and block, and that does nothing to stop accounts from posting hijack links all over several pages I'm subscribed to.

replies.message: Hey Tryson. Have you tried using these tips to report spam on Facebook? Learn more: http://bit.ly/1pzjVGC. -Jordan

Yes, I know how to use the report feature on posts, comments, and profiles. The problem is that there are people literally posting child pornography and hijack links in this group that I am a member of. On top of all that, when I select to report one of these links as spammy, it does not give me the option to report. That option is needed so that these profiles (which are fake) are taken down. Again, blocking and messaging doesn't do anything to stop it.
That option was there last week, but it no longer appears when I try to use it.

Facebook hi my dear iwant chanch my birthday i cant chanche

please chanche today
